channel.title: Oppression on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Oppression on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Working to End Oppression Makes More Sense as a Republican Value than a Democratic One
item.description: First, chill out. I promise I’ll make this make sense. Heck, if you can read this entire essay with an open mind before loading your mouth-canon for a bombardment my way, I’ll even wager you’ll agree with me. Disclosure: I’m not a member of either the Republican or Democratic Parties, but identify as a socially-conscious independent.
